definition: running in opposite direction (buses, trains, ferries etc)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentences.chinese: 他們最終來到一扇雕刻精美的對開門前。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic physiology and correlative physiological indexes of Phyllitis japonica responsed to the different degrees of drought treatment significantly.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱脅迫對對開蕨光合及生理指標產生顯著影響。

sentences.english: The number of dual trips running daily between Beijing and Shanghai are cut to 66 from the previous 88.
sentences.chinese: 北京至上海日間對開數從以前的88對減爲66對。

sentences.english: Met with a containership in the opposite course 8 miles off the port side.
sentences.chinese: 在左舷8海里外，遇到一艘對開的集裝箱船。

sentences.english: Tathong Channel, seen at dawn beyond a Hong Kong Island headland.
sentences.chinese: 黎明時份，香港島一個岬角對開的藍塘海峽美景。

sentences.english: If you're a bibliophile I'll be selling many folios in the next week so keep looking.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個藏書我將出售在下週許多對開紙，使望。

sentences.english: King John was first published in the First Folio of 1623.
sentences.chinese: 約翰國王是首次出版，在1623年第一對開本的。

sentences.english: New four-colour printing press outside of Heidelberg, CTP technology.
sentences.chinese: 全新對開海德堡四色印刷機，CTP技術。

sentences.english: It is adjoining a branch road off Tin Hau Temple Road.
sentences.chinese: 毗連天后廟道對開的一條支路。

sentences.english: I'll be selling many folios in the next week so keep looking.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個藏書我將出售在下週許多對開紙，使望。

sentences.english: You never could understand what it was that kept me trucking.
sentences.chinese: 你永遠無法明白爲什麼我對開長途貨車那麼着迷。

sentences.english: The finished folios are removable from the case.
sentences.chinese: 完成的對開紙從情形是可移去的。

sentences.english: They always build one door opposite another for the wind to. Way in.
sentences.chinese: 爲了通風起見，他們總是把兩扇門安得對開着。

sentences.english: This paper studies the transient flow rule of single phase gas after the well is opened.
sentences.chinese: 本文對開井後單相氣體瞬變流動的規律進行研究。

sentences.english: The two letters of credit shall be opened against each other.
sentences.chinese: 兩張信用證應以對開的方式開出。

sentences.english: The plan's format designed for large off version of the first printing 10000.
sentences.chinese: 該圖的幅面設計爲大對開版，首次印刷10000張。

Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
